item.title: PI ::staffmeeting command
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Good lord infamy, this is why you write your own command. Because everything released is garbage.

	if (playerCommand.equals("staffmeeting")) {
	    for (Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
		if (player.playerRights > 0 && player.playerRights < 4) {
		    ((Client) player).getPA().movePlayer(1, 1, 0);
		    ((Client) player).sendMessage(c.playerName + " has called a staff meeting.");
		}
	    }
	}

Really only need one cast to the Client object, was rushed. Sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: PI ::staffmeeting command
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

[quote=“Trade Me, post:1, topic:448125”]PI 317
Id like to make a command that would teleport all staff members to a certain location,
Ill get it started but ill need help on it…

If (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("staffmeeting")) { p.sendMessage("A staff meeting has been called to all staff members."); p.sendMessage("Please wait patiently for this staff meeting to come to an end."); p.sendMessage("Once it is over you can continue with your question's."); } [/quote]

Try that

[code]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("staffmeeting")) {
	for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
		if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
			Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
			if (c2.playerRights > 0 && c2.playerRights != 4) {
				c2.getPA().movePlayer(x-coordHere, y-coordHere, heightLevelHere);
				c2.sendMessage(c.playerName + " has called a staff meeting.");
			}
		}
	}
}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: PI ::staffmeeting command
item.dc:creator: @Trade_Me Trade Me
item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

PI 317
Id like to make a command that would teleport all staff members to a certain location,
Ill get it started but ill need help on it…

If (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("staffmeeting")) {
   p.sendMessage("A staff meeting has been called to all staff members.");
   p.sendMessage("Please wait patiently for this staff meeting to come to an end.");
   p.sendMessage("Once it is over you can continue with your question's.");
}

Read full topic
